data.name: Metro Sim Hustle - Adult Only Content
data.detailed_description:
MORE FROM DEPARTURE INTERACTIVE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1153210
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1335780


About the Game

This free DLC adds the adult-only content to Metro Sim Hustle. The DLC must be installed and enabled under the DLC section of the Metro Sim Hustle game properties to work.

This DLC is optional and does not assist in gameplay progression.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 3550 / FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti 3GB / R9 270X 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
